row.entry: Windows user name. The default is Administrator
Variable used to download the install-vdvs.ps1 PowerShell script. For example, https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vmware/vsphere-storage-for-docker/master/install-vdvs.ps1

Variable used to download vSphere Docker Volume Service software. This variable is combined with win_vdvs_version (below) to generate a URL of the form {{ windows_vdvs_path }}_{{ windows_vdvs_version }}.zip to download the software. For example, to download version 0.21, set win_vdvs_path equal to https://vmware.bintray.com/vDVS/vsphere-storage-for-docker_windows and win_vdvs_path equal to 0.21
Combined with win_vdvs_path, this variable is used to generate the URL for downloading the software.
Variable used to determine where vDVS software will be unzipped and installed from. The default is C:\Users\Administrator\Downloads
